titleStmt.title: SII 7.796: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 796. (A.R. No. 169 of 1902). ON THE WEST WALL OF THE SAME PRAKARA.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tiripuvanaccakkaravarttikaḷ maturaiyum Īḻamum pāṇṭiyan muṭittalaiyuṅ koṇṭaruḷiya śrīkulottuṅkacoḻatevarkku yāṇṭu 2 10 1vatu meṣanāyaṟṟu pūrvvapakṣattu daśamiyum putankiḻamaiyum peṟṟa makattu nāḷ naṭuvilnāṭāṉa rājarājavaḷanāṭṭup paṭṭānpākkanāṭṭuc coḻakulavallinallūr Ūrom Eḻuttu virutarājapa
yaṅkaravaḷanāṭṭu meṟkānāṭṭu Utavittirumāṇikuḻiuṭaiyār koyiltevakanmiyuṅ koyilkaṇakkanuṅ kaṇṭu Ikkoyil viśveśvaratevarkku Ulakuṭaiyanāyanār tirumeṉi kalliyāṇattirumeṉiyāka Ittevarkkup pūcaik kuṭalākat tirunāmattukkāṇiyum Ūrkkiḻ Iṟaiyiliyumāka nirvārttuk kuṭutta ni
lam Eṅkaḷuril coḻakulavallivatikku meṟku muṭikoṇṭacoḻavāykkālukkut teṟku Āṟāṅ kaṇṇāṟṟu nālāñ catirattu Oṭaikkut teṟkuppaṭṭa nilattup pālaiyūr Ellaiyuṟṟa tuṇṭattukku meṟkaṭaiya Ūṟpotuvāṉa nilam nālumā Innilam nālumāvum Ittevaṟkut tirunāmattukkāṇiyum Ūrk
ki ḻiṟaiyiliyumāka Oḻukilum pottakattilum nirnilattu kaṭaittaramāna ṟān tarattile Eṟiṭappaṇṇi viśveśvaratevar koyilil tirumāḷikaiyile kalveṭṭavum paṇṇi Innilattu Ellaikaḷile tiruccūlakkallu naṭavum paṇṇuvate paṇiyāl Ūṟkaṇakkut talaiccaṅkāṭuṭaiyān tiruvāḻmārvan Ulakamuṇṭā
n Eḻuttu paṇiyāl Ūṟkaṇakkut tuṟavāṇṭaiyāna piriyāttuṇai Uyyaniṉṟāṭuvān Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai tiruviḷakkan Aruḷāḷan kuṇavanāṉa Akanāṭṭu muventaveḷān Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai vaḻutavūruṭaiyān veḷān keṭilavāṇan Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai kuma veḷān tiruvāla
vāyuṭaiyānāṉa kumaraviccātiramuventaveḷān Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai milaiyaṅkiḻāṉ veḷān cāttanāṉa tiruniṟṟuccoḻamuventaveḷān Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai kuṇamaṅkalamuṭaiyān Atikaināyakan terpoliyaniṉṟānāna karikālacoḻa muventaventaveḷān Eḻuttu .
The letter ṭu is mostly written in this inscription like ṟā.
Digital edition of SII 7.796 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
